name: Little Robot (Marnus)
description:
Story

A small robot with free will explores the world learning its ways, while searching for its creator in search for answers about its creation. On the way learning the horrible truth of being a fugitive because of its free will being an anomaly to robot kind.

Credits

Creators of the Game:

- Marnus Labuschagne

- Gerbrandt Van der Walt 

Sound From: Zap Splat & FreeSound.org

Controls

Full PC support

  • Movement - WASD
  • F - Switch Characters
  • Space - Jump
  • E - Interact
  • Esc - Pause Menu 

Teammates Itch.io Pages

Gerbrandt Van der Walt: https://plx01.itch.io

Warning

This Game is in it's early Game Development stage and have a lot of problems and a lot of bugs that is in need to be fixed.

Game Version is 0.1.1
